title: LazyLibrarian LXC
textContent:
LazyLibrarian LXC 
                LazyLibrarian is a SickBeard, CouchPotato, Headphones-like
                    application
                    for ebooks, audiobooks and magazines.
                To create a new Proxmox VE LazyLibrarian LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                    
                    To Update LazyLibrarian, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/lazylibrarian.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                LazyLibrarian Interface: IP:5299
outerHTML:
LazyLibrarian LXC

LazyLibrarian is a SickBeard, CouchPotato, Headphones-like application for ebooks, audiobooks and magazines.

To create a new Proxmox VE LazyLibrarian LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update LazyLibrarian, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/lazylibrarian.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

LazyLibrarian Interface: IP:5299
